vine.math.vector

Class Vectors2

  • java.lang.Object
    • vine.math.vector.Vectors2

  • public final class Vectors2
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for operations on 2 dimensional vectors. All methods take the vectors elementwise and do not operate with Vec2f, Vec2d, Vec2i.

    Units

    The unit for angle is degree. If a method returns radians or takes a parameter as radians it will be notified in the corresponding docs. Positions are always in the unit of the parameters and will return the same unit as the given parameters.

    Author:
    Steffen Kromm, first created on 04.05.2016

      • getAngle

        public static double getAngle(double x1,
                              double y1,
                              double x2,
                              double y2)
        Return the angle between the 2 elementwise defined 2d vectors in radians. The value defines the direction of rotation from vector1 to vector2 and points always to a angle between [0,PI].
        Parameters:
        x1 - x Coordinate of the first vector
        y1 - y Coordinate of the first vector
        x2 - x Coordinate of the second vector
        y2 - y Coordinate of the second vector
        Returns:
        The smaller angle between the two vectors in radians (-PI,PI] defined as clockwise rotation of vector1 to vector2.
